description.value:
Acts as a long-range Vox. Allowing communications up to 10km. Due to inbuilt security, attempts to subvert or listen in on the vox have have -30 to relevent tests.

Requirements

Xenotech. +20 to Acquisition Tests for this item if acquired through Friendly Tau Settlement.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
